headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Valero Energy (VLO) After Strong 1-Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether Valero Energy at around US$200 per share still offers value, or if most of the opportunity is already priced in, this article is for you. The stock has been active recently, with a 1.2% decline over the last 7 days, a 9.1% gain over 30 days, and returns of 21.1% year to date and 52.3% over 1 year, which may be changing how investors think about its risk and reward. Recent news flow around US refiners has focused on supply capacity, regulatory developments, and...

headline: Gasoline-starved California is turning to fuel from the Bahamas
summary: California imported more gasoline in November than ever before, with more than 40% coming from the Bahamas.  The lengthy journey adds another layer of cost to California’s already expensive gasoline market.  California has among the strictest environmental regulations in the US, making it costly for energy companies to operate in, though a wave of upcoming refinery closures is prompting officials and regulators to soften their stance.

headline: Oil Refiner Stocks Are Having a Banner 2026. Should You Invest $1,000?
summary: Oil refiners are enjoying cheaper input prices and higher demand for their products.
